sentence: Things I likedclean friendly staff treated like a queen great activities nice pools good rooms good breakfast pizeria was really good Things I did not likedeli prices were marked up outrageously jackalopes food was not that great burger over done and sweet potato fries burnt bar by pool closed too early
We stayed two nights and had breakfast and dinner there
Very clean the only thing wsd the restsurants food it needs to inprove
Jackalope restaurant was great for burgers but VERY pricey
Adults can order a glass of wine from their outdoor patio menu while kids enjoy hot cocoa and roasting Smore marshmelows in the outdoor firepits in the patio in the evening
The resort has several dining options most of which are luxury priced
Great pool area and bar
Great room lovely hot tub although be warned it tarnishes silver jewellery great food in the Jackalopes bar grill
Breakfast buffet very good
We had the breakfast buffet and we enjoyed that as well
They have five restaurant in the hotel love it

The other nights we got a takeout of pizza which was just ok and most of it got thrown out to be honest and the one night I did have a good meal was when we got room service and i had their pesto pasta chicken which was awesome
I ordered a Cob salad
The bar at one of the restaurants was okay
Everything priced as if it is a 45 star establishment especially the restaurants and shop and It may well have been 30 years ago but not now
Both nights we ate at the Hotels Grill Restaurant
Ate in thr restaraunt two nights and the food was ok
This is a nice hotel with great views but the restaurant service at this location during our stay was bit slow
The bar and grill restaurant and mid tier restaurant leave a little to be desired for the prices but the fancy reservation only restaurant was fantastic
close to the South entrance of the park while also being close to Oakhurst for additional dining options in the evening
We were surprised by the 14 cup of soup delicious as it was
As an alternative there is a small deli which is fairly well stocked with food basics
They have huge portions and still add 5 dollars to share a meal they have a small supermarket “ deli ” which is unfortunately super expensive
Staff was friendly but for the most part not well trained especially in the dining rooms with a few notable exceptions of staff who went above and beyond
The dinner was disappointing you could hear the people stepping floor above you
There are two restaurants and a cafe at the property
After asking ourselves we ultimately went to the more casual place where many of the same menu options are available
We waited two hours for room service and pasta tasted like it was made a week before
The only complaint is that food sources can be limited and we wish Timberloft Pizza was open to give another dining option
The rooms however need to renovations as the jetted tub faucet was broken the ceramic soap dish in the shower was loose and the crown molding on the ceiling about the bed was separating from the wall
